EmailTemplate.name: General Partnership Agreement
EmailTemplate.subject: General Partnership Agreement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}, Thank you for contacting LegalZoom for your business services needs. In regard to your inquiry, LegalZoom can assist you to prepare a General Partnership Agreement and make the process easy for you. A general partnership is formed when two or more people agree to conduct business together. The General Partnership Agreement is a written document that contains important information such as the people involved, the duties and rights of each partner, the distribution of profits, and the governing laws. The General Partnership Agreement must be signed by each partner involved. For your convenience, I have provided the General Partnership Agreement fee and the link to get started below. General Partnership Agreement | $129.00 TO GET STARTED: http://www.legalzoom.com/partnership-agreement/partnership-agreement-overview.html Please feel free to contact us at (888) 381-8758 if you have any further questions. Our Business Formations Team business hours are {!snippetVariable.bizbsi_hours}. Best regards, {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Title}
{!User.CompanyName}
{!User.Address}
{!User.Phone} ext. {!User.Extension} This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717. Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book. This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email} Â© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
